Interface Serializable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Condition, Filter, Grouping, JsonMessage, Selector
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllGrouping, AllSelector, Component, ComponentContext, DefaultJsonMessage, FieldCondition, FieldFilter, FieldsGrouping, FieldsSelector, Input, InstanceContext, Module, ModuleContext, ModuleHook, Network, NetworkContext, Output, RandomGrouping, RandomSelector, RoundGrouping, RoundSelector, SourceCondition, SourceFilter, TagsCondition, TagsFilter, Verticle, VerticleContext, VerticleHook

    public interface Serializable
    A serializable object.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

        Sets the object state.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        SerializationException - If the given state is not applicable.
